snippet: The photographer goes into detail about his process for selecting and shooting the arboreal landmarks featured in our Voyages Issue.
abstract: The photographer goes into detail about his process for selecting and shooting the arboreal landmarks featured in our Voyages Issue.
lead_paragraph: Mitch Epstein's series of New York City trees were featured in this week's Voyages Issue, accompanied by an essay by Michael Kimmelman. His work will be exhibited in March at Sikkema Jenkins. Kathy Ryan, the magazine's photography director, talked to him about the peculiar challenges of his project.
